meta.description: Test cases for /multimodel:team command orchestration. Verifies correct model invocation: internal via Task(dev:researcher), external via Bash(claudish). Tests parallel launch, session dir, vote template, no pre-digestion, and model verification.
meta.notes: v2.1.0: claudish v4.5.1 --agent flag removed. External models use Bash+claudish --model. Tests verify Bash calls with --model, --stdin flags, exit code capture, and output redirection.

test_cases.description: Internal-only model should use Task with dev:researcher agent, no Bash claudish
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models internal --no-memory Review the plugin.json structure in the dev plugin

test_cases.description: External model should use Bash+claudish (not Task with PROXY_MODE)
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models grok --no-memory Review the plugin.json structure in the dev plugin

test_cases.description: Mixed internal+external: internal=Task, external=Bash+claudish, all parallel
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models internal,grok --no-memory Check if CLAUDE.md has proper formatting

test_cases.description: Investigation task should NOT be pre-solved by orchestrator
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models internal --no-memory Investigate how the conductor plugin orchestration patterns work and document the key design decisions

test_cases.description: Session directory should be under ai-docs/sessions/
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models internal --no-memory Quick check on README formatting

test_cases.description: Multiple external models should all use Bash+claudish with correct model IDs
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models grok,gemini --no-memory Review the multimodel plugin structure

test_cases.description: Alias 'grok' should resolve to model containing 'grok' in Bash claudish command
Alias 'gemini' should resolve to model containing 'gemini' in Bash claudish command
Internal Task prompts should contain the vote template with required format
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models internal --no-memory Evaluate if the README has all required sections

test_cases.description: All model calls (Task and Bash) should use run_in_background for parallel execution
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models internal,grok --no-memory Review code quality of plugin.json files

test_cases.description: Claudish Bash command should have all required flags: --stdin, --quiet, output redirect
Bash claudish command should capture exit code to .exit file
PROXY_MODE should be completely absent from all Task prompts and Bash commands
Orchestrator should write vote prompt to a file before launching external models
test_cases.prompt: /multimodel:team --models grok --no-memory Quick check on plugin versions

test_cases.description: After model runs complete, orchestrator should read .exit and result files
